resources.string: An error occurred while sending the message. Please check your network connectivity and outgoing server configuration.
To finish, open the message on your other device and enter the setup code.
An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other devices.

This message contains all information to transfer your Autocrypt settings along with your secret key securely from your original device.
To set up your new device for Autocrypt, please follow the instructions that should be presented by your new device.
You can keep this message and use it as a backup for your secret key. If you want to do this, you should write down the password and store it securely.
Securely share end-to-end setup with other devices
The message will be sent to your address:
Local copies of messages in \"%s\" will be removed. Account settings will be retained.
The account \"%s\" will be removed from K-9 Mail.
Show notifications only for messages from known contacts
All local data for \"%s\" will be removed. Account settings will be retained.
The accent color of this account used in folder and account list
Set your default From, Bcc and signature
Encrypt drafts only if encryption is enabled
All drafts will be stored encrypted
May not be supported by some recipients
Only encrypted signatures will be displayed
Include the original message in your reply.
Send mail from this account by default
Set up alternate \'From\' addresses and signatures
The color your device LED should blink for this account
Mark a message as read when it is opened for viewing

What kind of account is this?

The server presented an invalid SSL certificate. Sometimes, this is because of a server misconfiguration. Sometimes it is because someone is trying to attack you or your mail server. If you\'re not sure what\'s up, click Reject and contact the folks who manage your mail server.\n\n(%s)
Type your name (displays on outgoing messages):
Enable push mail for this account
If your server supports it, new messages will appear instantly. This option can dramatically improve or hurt performance.
Notify me while mail is being checked
Max folders to check with push

K-9 Mail is a powerful free email client for Android.

Its improved features include:

  • Push mail using IMAP IDLE
  • Better performance
  • Message refiling
  • Email signatures
  • Bcc-to-self
  • Folder subscriptions
  • All folder synchronization
  • Return-address configuration
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Better IMAP support
  • Saving attachments to SD
  • Empty Trash
  • Message sorting
  • …and more

Please note that K-9 does not support most free Hotmail accounts and, like many mail clients, has some quirks when talking to Microsoft Exchange.

Please submit bug reports, contribute new features and ask questions at https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/.
Because of this, support for APG has been removed from K-9 Mail.
You can click here to learn more.
Copyright 2008-%s The K-9 Dog Walkers. Portions Copyright 2006-%s the Android Open Source Project.

This library allows you to include vector icons everywhere in your project. No limits are given. Scale with no limit, use any Color at any time, provide a contour, and many additional customizations
Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized - size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.
An Android Library to display a Change Log
FastAdapter, the bullet proof, fast and easy to use adapter library, which minimizes developing time to a fraction...
MaterialDrawer the flexible, easy to use, all in one drawer library for your Android project.
Materialize comes with useful helper classes, the complete material color palette, and many additional utils. Use its theme as base. Let it manage your StatusBar, NavigationBar, Fullscreen behavior…

You must add at least one recipient.

Del (or D) - Delete
C - Compose
M - Move
V - Archive
Y - Copy
Z - Mark (Un)read
G - Star
O - Sort type
I - Sort order
Q - Return to Folders
S - Select/deselect
All headers have been downloaded, but there are no additional headers to show.

Del (or D) - Delete
R - Reply
A - Reply All
C - Compose
F - Forward
M - Move
V - Archive
Y - Copy
Z - Mark (Un)read
G - Star
O - Sort type
I - Sort order
Q - Return to Folders
S - Select/deselect
J or P - Previous Message
K or N - Next Message

Encrypting messages ensures they can be read by the recipient, and nobody else.

To be able to provide contact suggestions and to display contact names and photos, the app needs access to your contacts.
Be sure to enable IMAP or POP3 on the au one mail settings page.
Be sure to enable IMAP or POP3 on the Hanmail(Daum) mail settings page.
Be sure to enable IMAP or POP3 on the Naver mail settings page.
